Davenport.Davenport Municipal Airport (Iowa): Davenport Municipal Airport (IATA: DVN, ICAO: KDVN, FAA LID: DVN) is a general aviation airport located about 7 miles (11 km) north of downtown Davenport, a city in Scott County, Iowa, United States. The airport, which dates back to 1948, has also been home to the Quad City Air Show since 1987. The air show occurs the last weekend of June every year.
